level.heading: INVESTIGATIVE ASSISTANCE (ยง 1-1110) The Board shall seek investigative assistance, as necessary, from the Office ofhe Inspector General (OIG), the OCFO, the OAG, and other agencies of theistrict government in the course of the Board’s review of a reportediolation.
SOURCE
level.text: Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 7968 (August 13,004) [EXPIRED]; as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 54 DCR 4402 (May1, 2007).
